text: Uzalo is a telenovela produced by Stained Glass Productions, which is co-owned by Kobedi "Pepsi" Pokane and South African hiphop artist HHP. ==Cast== *Leleti Khumalo as MaNzuza *Sthandwa Nzuza as Magwaza *Abigail Kubeka as Mamlambo *Sihle Ndaba as Smangele *Thando Thabethe as Guest *Nyalleng Thibedi as Zekhethelo Mhlongo Category:South African culture Category:Television series
title: Uzalo
